Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Besaka darana vali'am la'i safalata hai
Saga ate agura
ate barabara umara vali'am naujavana laraki'am
Ate bhare ho'e jama
Uthe uha mithi'a ate jhuthi'am galam nahim sunanage
Tere raba valom unham de karamam de anusara badala hovega
Rahimana valom jihara akasa ate dharati ate unham de vicakara di'am cizam da palanahara hai. Ko'i takata nahim rakhada ki usa nala gala kare
Jisa dina jibarila ate farisate kataram bana ke kharhe honage, (usa vele) ko'i nahim' bolega. Paratu (usa tom' binham? Jisa nu rahimana agi'a deve ate uha yoga gala kahega)
Iha dina nisacita hai, sau jihara cahe apane raba vala (apana) tikana bana lave
Asim tuhanu nere a jana vali saza tom dara dita hai. Jisa dina manukha usa nu dekha lavega, jihara usa de hatham ne age bheji'a hai tam avagi'akari akhega ki kasa! Maim siti huda
Sahu hai jaram tom putana vali'am havavam di
Ate sahu hai, sadhama calana vali'am havavam di
Ate sahu hai, tairana vale badalam di
Phira age vadhana vali'am di
phira mamali'am da upa'a karana vali'am di
Jisa dina hila dena vali hila devegi
Usa tom magarom ika hora a'una vali ciza avegi
Kine dila usa tom kaba rahe honage
Unham di'am akham jhuka rahi'am honagi'am
Uha kahide hana ki ki asim pahili halata vica vapisa janvage
Ki jadom sadi'am hadi'am gala sara janagi'am
Unham ne akhi'a ki iha vapasi tam bare ghate vali hovegi
Uha tam basa ika jhiraka hovegi
Phira turata uha maidana vica hazira honage
Ki tuhade kola musa di gala pahuci hai
